## type [RateLimiter](<https://github.com/gemini-oss/rego/blob/main/pkg/common/ratelimit/ratelimiter.go#L14-L24>)



```go
type RateLimiter struct {
    Limit          int
    Available      int
    ResetTimestamp int64
    RetryAfter     int
    UsesReset      bool
    UsesRetryAfter bool

    Logger *log.Logger
    // contains filtered or unexported fields
}
```
